DataElement.preferredDefinition: Specifies whether this study must be registered as required by applicable laws. OTHER NAME(S): Section 801 Clinical Trial NOTE(S): Under US Public Law 110-85, Title VIII, Section 801, applicable drug trials include controlled clinical investigations, other than Phase I investigations, of a drug or biologic subject to US FDA regulation. Applicable device clinical trials are controlled trials with health outcomes of devices subject to FDA regulation, other than small feasibility studies, and pediatric postmarket surveillance.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The relation of something to the matter at hand.:A rule or order issued by an authority stating what may or may not be done or how something must be done._Having relevance; capable of being applied.:An indicator that can be set or unset in order to signal whether a particular condition is true.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Default Conceptual Domain for UML Loader
Health Informatics - Harmonized data types for information interchange

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.
